flash: Built-In Flash. Approx. 0.5 – 11.5 m/1 ft 8 in. – 37 ft (mode auto, auto ISO)
lens: NIKKOR lens 18.5 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28 mm lens in 35mm 135 format) f/2.8
ccd: 23.6 × 15.6 mm Nikon DX format CMOS; approx. 16.93 million total pixels
exposuresystem: Programmed auto with flexible program, shutter priority auto, aperture-priority auto, manual with exposure bracketing and exposure compensation (±5 EV [photos] or ±2 EV [movies] in steps of 1/3 EV)
shutterspeed: Mechanical and CMOS electronic shutter. 4 Frames Per Second Shooting.
